Text: Looks great, works great - for everyone in the US, this doesn't hit the air until Jan.6, 2013!

if you cant play this, make sure you have "VLC player" and/or the latest codecs installed.. .mkv is an oddball (but very efficient!) codec that needs a specialized player

thank you so much for the up! would hate to have to wait 4 months for PBS to air this.

My Blu ray player that plays almost 99% of Matroskas I throw at it crashed on this file. Sure it does play in VLC but there is something funky with it. Seems to be a few encoders doing "funky" things with high def video files these days.
Great quality. Plays normally idk what other ppl talking about.
Sound is there but no picture
